Chap. 15 - Admonition Will Be Heard

 
                      INTRODUCTION 

                                               -
 
     A NUMBER OF HELPFUL MESSAGES THAT APPEARED IN NOTEBOOK LEAFLETS WERE ADDRESSED MORE SPECIFICALLY TO SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTIST WORKERS. SUCH OF THESE COUNSELS AS HAVE NOT BEEN INCLUDED OR PARALLELED IN OTHER ELLEN G. WHITE BOOKS OF RECENT ISSUANCE, NOW APPEAR IN THIS VOLUME. THE READER WILL NOTE THAT THESE MESSAGES TOUCH ON MANY SUBJECTS OF SPECIAL INTEREST TO THE MINISTRY, AND TO ALL WHO HAVE CONSECRATED THEIR TALENTS TO THE SERVICE OF GOD.
